CNN.notes: Verified by multiple sources including Ad Fontes and MBFC.

The New York Times.notes: Known for in-depth journalism; opinion section is distinct.

Fox News.notes: Factuality score varies widely between news and opinion segments.

Vox.notes: Focuses on providing context and deeper explanations of topics.

Natural News.notes: Frequently promotes misinformation and unproven theories.

The Wall Street Journal.notes: Known for a strong business and financial focus.

The Hill.notes: Focuses on political news and legislative developments in the U.S.
